products.title: groovy-000 street beanie
products.description: part of the "000 Core Collection", this fisherman-style beanie is a classic item that blends with any type of style. *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -standard, unisex fit-fisherman-one size fits most (not XL heads ðŸ˜­) features: -ribbed-cuffed hem how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, low temp-air dry-more you wash, shorter longevity of embroidery
products.descriptionHtml:
part of the "000 Core Collection", this fisherman-style beanie is a classic item that blends with any type of style.

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing:

-standard, unisex fit
-fisherman
-one size fits most (not XL heads ðŸ˜­)

features:

-ribbed
-cuffed hem

how to care:

-wash inside out on delicate, low temp
-air dry
-more you wash, shorter longevity of embroidery

products.title: groovy-001 "OG" heavyweight oversized tee
products.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "OG" piece captures the liveliness of a groove that can be found internally. this groove, while internal, can be expressed boldly, as it is printed largely and boldly in the back. female model 5'4" wearing XL, male model 5'6" wearing M *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing -men's sizing -heavy duty, thicc & comforting -oversized -thick neck ribbing features: -100% USA cotton (charcoal grey: 50% USA cotton & 50% polyester) -7.5 oz 16 singles -3.5% lycra mock neck ribbing -heavy knitting how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp -air dry recommended
products.descriptionHtml:
designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "OG" piece captures the liveliness of a groove that can be found internally. this groove, while internal, can be expressed boldly, as it is printed largely and boldly in the back.

female model 5'4" wearing XL, male model 5'6" wearing M

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing
-men's sizing
-heavy duty, thicc & comforting
-oversized
-thick neck ribbing

features:
-100% USA cotton (charcoal grey: 50% USA cotton & 50% polyester)
-7.5 oz 16 singles
-3.5% lycra mock neck ribbing
-heavy knitting

how to care:
-wash inside out on delicate, cold temp
-air dry recommended

products.title: groovy-003 "TOGETHER" super-heavyweight oversized hoodie
products.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "TOGETHER" piece is inspired by the friendship of two of our members, hand-drawn the moment that's been captured as they grooved at a music festival together. this design is printed on a soothing, thicc pastel hoodie model 5'6" wearing M *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -men's sizing-oversized fit features: -10 oz (330 gm) 70% cotton/30% polyester blend 3-end fleece-handcrafted with premium ring spun cotton-created with a 3-end fleece for comfort-premium heavyweight garment-heavy gauge round drawcord-nickel eyelets how to care: -wash inside out, cold temp-air dry recommended
products.descriptionHtml:
designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "TOGETHER" piece is inspired by the friendship of two of our members, hand-drawn the moment that's been captured as they grooved at a music festival together.

this design is printed on a soothing, thicc pastel hoodie

model 5'6" wearing M

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

-men's sizing
-oversized fit

-handcrafted with premium ring spun cotton
-created with a 3-end fleece for comfort
-premium heavyweight garment
-heavy gauge round drawcord
-nickel eyelets

how to care:

-wash inside out, cold temp
-air dry recommended

products.title: groovy-004 "G-STEP" faded crewneck
products.description: designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "G-STEP" piece captures smoothness and confidence that one can find as they become more in tune with their inner selves. design is printed on a soothing heavyweight sweater that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character female model 5'6" wearing L sandstone, male model 6'2" wearing XXL pigment black *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. ordering a size up is always recommended ðŸ˜Œ fit & sizing: -baggy unisex fit features:-9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams-twill neck tape-1 x 1 ribbing at neck, cuffs and waistband how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry recommended
products.descriptionHtml:
designed by GROOVY BASEMENTÂ®'s artist team, "G-STEP" piece captures smoothness and confidence that one can find as they become more in tune with their inner selves. design is printed on a soothing heavyweight sweater that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character

female model 5'6" wearing L sandstone, male model 6'2" wearing XXL pigment black

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

ordering a size up is always recommended ðŸ˜Œ

-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams
-twill neck tape
-1 x 1 ribbing at neck, cuffs and waistband

how to care:

-air dry recommended

products.title: limited-002 "IDGAF" premium faded hoodie
products.description: part of the "LIMITED Collection", "IDGAF" piece is inspired by the ability to claim internal space, block out any hate and distraction one may experience in life. sometimes, ignorance is bliss. this allows us to channel our creative energy into things that are more fulfilling. this design is embroidered on a soothing heavyweight pastel hoodie that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character models 5'6" wearing XL *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -unisex-slightly oversized features: -9oz (300 gm) 80% cotton/20% polyester blend-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams-1 x 1 ribbing at cuffs and waistband-sewn eyelets how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry recommended
products.descriptionHtml:
part of the "LIMITED Collection", "IDGAF" piece is inspired by the ability to claim internal space, block out any hate and distraction one may experience in life. sometimes, ignorance is bliss. this allows us to channel our creative energy into things that are more fulfilling.
this design is embroidered on a soothing heavyweight pastel hoodie that's been pigment-dyed with vintage character

models 5'6" wearing XL

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing:

-unisex
-slightly oversized

features:

-100% cotton 30 singles face yarn split stitch double needle sewing on all seams
-1 x 1 ribbing at cuffs and waistband
-sewn eyelets

how to care:

-air dry recommended

products.title: limited-005 "BADBAD" premium distressed tee
products.description: part of the "LIMITED Collection", "BADBAD" piece is for all the introverted, extroverted, quiet, loud baddies out there. this design is printed on a mineral/vintage washed tee. male model 6'2" wearing XXL denim, female model 5'6" wearing L black *10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area. fit & sizing: -unisex-straight fit features: -4.3 oz, 100% ringspun combed cotton-preshrunk to minimize shrinkage-double-needle top stitch at sleeves, bottom hem, shoulders, and armhole-shoulder-to-shoulder tape-side seamed construction how to care: -wash inside out on delicate, cold temp-air dry-more you wash, less longevity of embroidery
products.descriptionHtml:
part of the "LIMITED Collection", "BADBAD" piece is for all the introverted, extroverted, quiet, loud baddies out there. this design is printed on a mineral/vintage washed tee.

male model 6'2" wearing XXL denim, female model 5'6" wearing L black

*10% of proceeds go to GROOVY Creative Fund to support rising creatives in the Chicagoland area.

fit & sizing:

-unisex
-straight fit


features:

-4.3 oz, 100% ringspun combed cotton
-preshrunk to minimize shrinkage
-double-needle top stitch at sleeves, bottom hem, shoulders, and armhole
-shoulder-to-shoulder tape
-side seamed construction

how to care:

-wash inside out on delicate, cold temp
-air dry
-more you wash, less longevity of embroidery
